Player History
Released by New York (N) on 10/6/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1968...
Injured on 5/30/1968 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/27/1969 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/7/1979 to a 1-year deal worth $999,999 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/14/1982 to a minor league deal...
Drafted in 4th round, 69th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1985...
Injured on 6/27/1988 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/18/1990, off Scott Terry (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/22/1990, off Sid Fernandez (PHI)...
